alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 8:30PM CST until March 03 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...McLean, De Witt, Piatt, Champaign and Vermilion Counties. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour will combine with wind gusts up to 45 mph to create difficult travel conditions Friday afternoon. Expect a wet, heavy snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Vermilion
